subject: [Radiance-general] HDR Photos with evalglar
body:
hallo,

I have a question before i go through my search:

I made HDR pictures with photosphere, then i tried to use evalglare ( in
windows) but it gave me the
following message " error: no valid view specified"

- Does anyone knows how to fix the problem with clear steps? (i guess i
have to include header file
and so on, but i am not sure how ! ?

another question :) :

- I have mac version 10.6.8 and radiance 4.2a, but evalglare is not working
anymore, should i
upgrade my mac to 10.8?


p.s: I worked with evalglare before but only through radiance hdr pictures.

thx in advance

nassif


--
